name: Luke
description:
Help on greenlight: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/...

********

Hey, My name is Luke and I have to save the world. Yeah, cliche right? But it is not so simple, I have a long way to do this. So, you'll help me?!

*********

You're Luke, you find a sword near your house. When you touch the sword, you go to another world. You will discover that the sword is the key to saving the world, and you're the hero, the bearer of the sword.

*********

You can play only the tutorial yet, but I'll upload the 1° episode soon.

Some info:
• Engine: RPG MAKER VX ACE
• The Battle System is like zelda, will not have turn-based battle.
• When you start a new game, you'll play the tutorial.
• The tutorial stats will go to story stats.
• You can marry.
• Have powers (fireball and others.).
• N° of Episodes: 8.
• Duration: about 2/3 hours.
• Will have Trading Cards?: Yes.
• Will have achievements?: Yes.
• Control Support.

Thanks for all your support.
